deleteModal.question: Are you sure you want to delete {{title}} board?

aboutModal.content1: This website is a todo manager inspired by Trello.
aboutModal.content2:
It resembles a frontend prototype of a board styled list of lists, there is no database or backend server.
Data is currently only stored locally and in session. Created with Angular 11. Feel free to browse provided
examples of boards or create your own.
aboutModal.howToUse1: Left mouse to drag tasks or lists
aboutModal.howToUse2: Right click to edit tasks or list name

section.title: All boards
section.description: Explore or create your own board

addBoard.title: Add board
addBoard.description: Create a new board. Test it out. Saved only locally in memory.
